attributes.action: prevent Durham County Council from removing the statue of Lord Londonderry from Durham Market Square.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Durham's Market Place is to get a major revamp later this year as part of the city's 2020 Vision programme - which could see the statue of Lord Londonderry moved.

The locally famous statue of the "Horse with no tounge" is very important to everyone who lives in and around Durham. It is an important part of our culture and we should all do the best we can to save this statue.
